definition: to encircle/to surround/all around/to wear by wrapping around (scarf, shawl)
fence/railing/hurdle/column or box (of text or other data)

sentences.english: We keep animals in pens to fatten them.
sentences.chinese: 我们把动物关在围栏里把它们养肥。

sentences.english: He led the horses into the yard.
So she's been eyeing a sun-drenched section of our back fence.
sentences.chinese: 所以，她一直盯著一个阳光普照的一段我们回来围栏。

sentences.english: The town's mayor, Jin Sato, spent the night on the roof clutching to a fence on its edge. (AP Photo/David Guttenfelder)
sentences.chinese: 市长佐藤金整个晚上都在紧紧抓住一个围栏的边缘。

sentences.english: We held them for about ten weeks inside the pens.
sentences.chinese: 我们把它们在围栏里关了有10周左右。

sentences.english: Green kept 10 tame dingoes in separate laboratory pens.
sentences.chinese: 格林把十只驯服了的野狗养在隔离的实验围栏里。

sentences.english: As he clambered over the railings he grinned at Manuel.
sentences.chinese: 在他攀爬翻过围栏时他对曼纽尔咧嘴笑了笑。

sentences.english: Do not attach to crib or playpen.
sentences.chinese: 请勿连接在童床或游戏围栏上。

sentences.english: Another was said to have crawled under the surround fence.
sentences.chinese: 还有人说，另一名记者从围栏下爬了进去。

sentences.english: A surge of demonstrators broke through the fence.

sentences.chinese: 是否设有围栏或安全罩？

sentences.english: They decided to raise it from one to two meters high.
sentences.chinese: 饲养员们决定将围栏的高度由原来的1米加到2米。

sentences.english: Mary deposited the baby in the crib.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽把婴儿放在有围栏的童床上。

sentences.english: The lambs were kept in the stockade.
sentences.chinese: 小羊羔被放在围栏里养着。

sentences.english: Its low-cost fiber-optic sensor cable is easily attached to a fence.
sentences.chinese: 低成本的光缆传感线很容易与防护围栏连接。

sentences.english: Possible entanglement or strangulation injury when attached to crib or playpen .
sentences.chinese: 连接在童床或游戏围栏时可能发生缠结或窒息危害。

definition: to surround/to encircle/to enclose/to fence in
Huatan township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
decorative mass planting of flowers and shrubs, often bounded by a low masonry border, and often part of a streetscape
